title: Champion won't move
body:
During games whenever i try to move in any direction My champion will stay still. Sometimes for up to 40 seconds and than the game will jump forward. My fps is fine, my Ms is low and everything else is working fine but I CAN't PLAY. 


Any tips on what to do to try and fix?

replies.body:
If you can see the game playing around you, but you can't seem to move (or your character only moves like 5 seconds after you told it to), there's a good chance that it could be caused by an unstable connection. If you have an unstable connection, it can take awhile for your commands to reach our servers which causes this rubberbanding effect. 

Try going through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure your network has a stable connection throughout the entire game.
I have this same problem. The college I attend has 800Mbs up and down, as well as 1ms ping. There is literally no reason this should be happening, so I don't understand what is going on.
